solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public boolean isBalanced(TreeNode root) {--newline--        if(root==null){--newline--            return true;--newline--        }--newline--        return height(root)!=-1;--newline--        --newline--    }--newline--    public int height(TreeNode node){--newline--        if(node==null){--newline--            return 0;--newline--        }--newline--        int lH=height(node.left);--newline--        if(lH==-1){--newline--            return -1;--newline--        }--newline--        int rH=height(node.right);--newline--        if(rH==-1){--newline--            return -1;--newline--        }--newline--        if(lH-rH<-1 || lH-rH>1){--newline--            return -1;--newline--        }--newline--        return Math.max(lH,rH)+1;--newline--    }--newline--}
